Consensus

public Consensus(InformationCriterion ic,
                 double supportThreshold)
Instantiates a new consensus tree builder.

Parameters:
ic - the information criterion to build the weighted trees
supportThreshold - the minimum support for a clade

                 double supportThreshold,

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main method. This method allows testing of consensus tree building. It requires at least 2 arguments.
